message.body: Hey! R u back?! What r u up to this weekend? Want to help me shoot a little bolex?
I'm back! But heading to NY Saturday!
Me neither! I'm bummed because I need some help though. What abt next weekend?
I have a recital and surprise party at my house for Julian on Saturday so it's a busy weekend! What about during the week???
On a Tuesday or weds evening before it's dark?
Maybe weds. Or maybe we can just have dinner weds and talk about it before we shoot in case it's a shitty idea?
Yeah, but don't want to waste film OR money. Well let's do wed and I'll bring camera.
There r mouse turds on my desk at work.
